edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-gold-exchange-100: Hello, we are short on gold, I need 100 ingots. I will offer 100 crowns for them. Interested?
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-silver-exchange-1: I offer 25 crowns for 100 silver ingots, interested?
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-steel-exchange-10: We are short on steel for rust-fighting equipment. I need 100 ingots. I will pay generously! How much? 25 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-iron-exchange-160: Buying iron! I will pay well! I will buy 160 ingots for 10 crowns!
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-bismuthbronze-100: We are short on bronze for decorations, I will buy 100 ingots for 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-tinbronze-exchang: We are short on bronze for decorations, I will buy 100 ingots for 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-copper-exchange-9: We are short on copper for equipment, I will buy 95 ingots for 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-bismuth-exchange-: We are short on bismuth in the warehouse, I will buy 100 ingots for 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-gold-exchange-10x: I Could Use a Little More Gold! (10x)
Although we have a supply, I will buy 10 more ingots for 10 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-silver-exchange-2: I Need a Bit More Silver! (20x)
We have a supply of silver, but this amount will still fit. I will pay 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-steel-exchange-20: I Could Use Some Extra Steel! (20x)
Although we have enough steel, I won't complain about having more. I will buy 20 ingots for 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-iron-exchange-16x: I Need a Handful of Iron! (16x)
Iron is a very useful metal, we have plenty but I can still fit 16 more. I will pay 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-bismuthbronze-exc: A little bronze always comes in handy, I will buy 20 ingots for 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-tinbronze-exchang: I Need a Bit of Tin Bronze! (20x)
Hello. I will buy 20 tin bronze ingots. I offer 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-copper-exchange-1: Our warehouse is full, but copper is a good metal. I will buy 19 ingots for 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:ingot-bismuth-exchange-: I Need a Little More Bismuth! (20x)
Bismuth, a beautiful metal. The warehouse is full, but I can still fit 20 ingots. I will pay you 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:flour-exchange-512x-des: Our granary is a bit empty, I will buy 8 sacks of flour for 2 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:flour-exchange-256x-tit: I would still use some Flour! (256x)
edenvalrpeconomy:flour-exchange-256x-des: If you still have some flour laying around your village, I will buy 4 sacks of them for 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:packed-pemmican-exchang: Monastery needs 30 pemmican for their journeys. Deliver 30 packed pemmican and I will give you 30 crowns.!
We would like to preserve more pemmican (10x)
We still need some more pemmican for our journeys, for 10 packed pemmican I will give you 10 crowns
edenvalrpeconomy:mushroom-pate-exchange-: Sustenance for the Monastery - Mushroom Pate (30x)
Monastery needs 30 packed mushrooms for their journeys. Deliver 30 mushroom pate and I will give you 30 crowns.!
We would like to preserve more mushrooms (10x)
We still need some more mushroom pates for our journeys, for 10 packs I will give you 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:cheese-cheddar-exchange: You know what to do 30 of this round ambriosa and I will give you 15 crowns.
Just a bit more of my favorite type of food 10 will suffice, will give you 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:cloth-exchange-16x-desc: We are a bit short on cloth for clothing, I will buy 16 sheets from you for 4 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:cloth-wool-exchange-16x: We are a bit short on wool cloth for clothing, I will buy 16 sheets from you for 4 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:sewingkit-exchange-8x-d: Our clothes are fraying, I will buy 8 sewing kits for 4 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:leather-sturdy-plain-ex: We need better satchels, and thus sturdy tanned leather. I will buy 30 pieces for 6 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:cloth-exchange-4x-desc: Although we have cloth, a few more pieces will come in handy. I will pay 1 crown for 4 pieces.
edenvalrpeconomy:cloth-wool-exchange-4x-: I Could Use Some Wool Cloth! (4x)
Although we have wool cloth, a few more pieces will come in handy. I will pay 1 crown for 4 pieces.
edenvalrpeconomy:sewingkit-exchange-4x-t: I Need a Few Sewing Kits! (4x)
edenvalrpeconomy:sewingkit-exchange-4x-d: I already have some kits, but 4 more won't hurt. I will pay you 2 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:leather-sturdy-plain-ex: Although I already have some, a bit more will come in handy. I will buy 5 pieces for 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:fat-exchange-60x-desc: We are short on fat for making fur, I will buy 60 lumps for 3 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:mapbook-exchange-15x-de: We are expanding our library with more maps and are short on atlases. I will buy 15 for 3 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:compass-exchange-60x-ti: I need to acquire a lot of compasses! (60x)
edenvalrpeconomy:compass-exchange-60x-de: For the people that are lost easily and can't figure out world sides I need 20 compasses any type. Will give you 3 crown for that.
edenvalrpeconomy:compass-exchange-20x-ti: I need some of them compasses! (20x)
edenvalrpeconomy:compass-exchange-20x-de: For the people that are lost easily and can't figure out world sides I need 20 compasses any type. Will give you 1 crown for that.
edenvalrpeconomy:fat-exchange-20x-desc: Although I have plenty of fat, I will take 20 more lumps for 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:mapbook-exchange-5x-des: We don't lack atlases, but 5 more will always come in handy. I will pay you 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:ore-lignite-exchange-28: I’m Running Out of Lignite Coal! (288x)
We are short on coal for heating, I will buy a larger supply. I will pay 6 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:ore-bituminouscoal-exch: I will buy a large supply of coal. I will pay 6 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:charcoal-exchange-320x-: We are short on charcoal for furnaces, I will buy a larger supply. I will pay 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:peatbrick-exchange-330x: We need a supply of peat bricks for the kitchen, I will pay 3 crowns for them.
edenvalrpeconomy:ore-lignite-exchange-48: I Could Use Some Lignite Coal! (48x)
Although we have a supply of coal, a few more lumps will fit. I will pay 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:ore-bituminouscoal-exch: I Need a Bit of Bituminous Coal! (32x)
Although we have a supply of coal, a few more lumps will fit. I will pay 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:charcoal-exchange-64x-d: The bin is almost full, but I can still fit this much. I will pay 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:peatbrick-exchange-110x: I Need a Few Peat Bricks! (110x)
The kitchen has a pile of peat bricks, but I can still fit this many. I will pay 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:gear-rusty-exchange-50x: Hello, I will buy 50 rusty gears for 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:metal-scraps-exchange-5: I will buy some scrap metal for 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:metal-parts-exchange-50: I’m Running Out of Metal Parts! (50x)
I will buy some parts for 5 crowns.
edenvalrpeconomy:gear-rusty-exchange-10x: I Could Use Some Rusty Gears! (10x)
Although I already have a pile, I will take a few more for 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:metal-scraps-exchange-1: I Need a Few Metal Scraps! (10x)
I will take a bit more, but not too much. I will pay 1 crown.
edenvalrpeconomy:metal-parts-exchange-10: I have quite a lot, but I will take a few more. I will pay you 1 crown.
